title: Insights into docking in megasynthases from the investigation of the toblerol trans-AT polyketide synthase: many α-helical means to an end
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, 5,669-683
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00075G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Serge Scat, Kira J. Weissman, Benjamin Chagot
This work identifies a novel class of docking domains (DDs) from the toblerol modular trans-AT polyketide synthase (PKS) and establishes previously unrecognised architectural relationships between known types of DDs.
